QuestData.Title: Where's Wizzle?
QuestData.Description: Hey, $n, you haven't seen my other brother, Wizzle, have you?$B$BI just know that the pirates captured him! He said that he was going to try to sell them some engineering stuff, or something.$B$BWould you please look for him up at the Southsea Holdfast to the east? I'll bet that no-good goblin he's always traveling with, Synge, got him into trouble!
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Wizzle Brassbolts at the Southsea Holdfast in Thousand Needles.
QuestData.RewardText: Hey! Get me out of here!
